name: Alien X AI
description:
this is an endless runner game the enemies spawn constantly after regular interverals which are to be killed. The player can spawn or unspawn the AI. when player spawns the AI, it moves towards the switch which in turn kill the enemies. When player unspawns the AI it disappears. The player can't directly kill enemies with the help of switch because only AI can interact with the the switch

How To Score

kill 1 enemy - get 1 score

Pixel art and Sound effects made by Kenney
